meanings.definition: A person or team that is leading in a race or competition.
meanings.sent1: The frontrunners sprinted ahead in the race.
meanings.sent2: The frontrunners crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent3: The frontrunners made the other competitors look slow!
meanings.sent4: In the race of life, they were always the frontrunners.
meanings.sent5: The image of the frontrunners stayed in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: A candidate or group that is expected to win an election or competition.
meanings.sent1: The frontrunners in the election had strong support.
meanings.sent2: The frontrunners were confident about their victory.
meanings.sent3: The frontrunners' campaign was full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: Their success made them the frontrunners in the industry.
